subject: Education (K-12)

Football
Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides
lead_paragraph: The girlfriend testified that a semiprofessional football player killed in 2013 and Aaron Hernandez, the former New England Patriots tight end, were in the “early stages of friendship.”
snippet: The girlfriend testified that a semiprofessional football player killed in 2013 and Aaron Hernandez, the former New England Patriots tight end, were in the “early stages of friendship.”
